inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed anaplastic astrocytoma on the tentorium at first relapse
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: unequivocal evidence of tumor recurrence or aggravation by MRI scan after treatment for initial onset
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: anaplastic astrocytoma diagnosed histologically by the last pathological diagnostic tests (including initial diagnosis) prior to initial administration of temozolomide
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tissue samples available for Central Pathologic Reviewer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MRI scan performed within 14 days before initial temozolomide administration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: assessable tumor site confirmed by MRI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age >=18 years, either sex, inpatients or outpatients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Use of medically approved contraception methods in fertile subjects
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate clinically laboratory values obtained within 14 days before initial temozolomide administration
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: tumor biopsy, regardless of tumor resection at initial diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who received chemotherapy within 6 weeks before initial temozolomide administration
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has undergone radiation therapy. However, they have also received chemotherapy within the past 6 weeks, which is a contraindication for this trial.
